channel.title: Search Engine on uweb browser: unlimited power
channel.description: Recent content in Search Engine on uweb browser: unlimited power

item.title: Search engine files
item.description: Search engine file names have ".search" as postfix. When they are clicked, the associated bookmark files with postfix ".search.html" would be appended. Ex: the associated bookmark for "foo.search" is "foo.search.html". Any ".search" file can be opened as search engine file, each line of which has one of the following formats: [Engine name]:[url without '%s' inside] [Engine name]:[url with '%s' as keyword] [Engine name]:POST:[post params with '%s' as keyword]:[url] [Engine name]:[Extra request headers]:[post params with '%s' as keyword]:[url]
